Changelog
=========

1.0.4 - 2013-02-12
------------------

- Restore event notifications by listening for IObjectModified event

1.0.3 - 2012-11-07
------------------

- Registrant is not globally allowed
  [aclark]

1.0.2 - 2012-11-07
------------------

- Modernize ATs
  [aclark]

1.0.1 - 2012-11-05
------------------

- Fix view template
  [aclark]

1.0.0 - 2012-11-05
------------------

- Initial release
  [aclark]

< 1.0.0
-------

Written and developed by Jason McVetta
